fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Inspect (Night): Check to see if a player is able to be converted. If they are, learn their role.
- Ramble (Night, 2 uses): Talk about Conversion, convincing a player conversion is pretty cool. They become Viri (1603) but cannot convert.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock, Redirect Immune.
- You may only convert Town, Neutral Benign, and Neutral Evil roles, and only if they lack defense.
